points: Maintain an existing Flask service and Python data pipeline to rapidly design and implement prototype dashboards.
Design, implement and maintain a React-based dashboard and Flask microservice to build a service used by project managers to triage tickets based on geographical regions.

Help design, implement and maintain a React-based dashboard, Flask microservice, and Python data pipeline to build a service for sampling and analyzing subsets of a large, geographic ticket repository.
Regularly communicate with clients and consume business documents in order to conceptualize prototypes and gather use cases.
Close an average of 31 tickets per quarter, which consists of user troubleshooting, code integration, and application feature requests.
